zh-cn: 中国共产党左派反对派

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上的一个托洛茨基主义政党，由陈独秀等人于1931年在上海成立。1948年分裂解散。
description.en: A Trotskyist political party in Chinese history, founded in Shanghai in 1931 by Chen Duxiu and others. It split and dissolved in 1948.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产主义同盟的创始人及首任书记。
description.en: Founder and first secretary of the Communist League of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国的托洛茨基主义组织之一，参与合并组建了中国共产主义同盟。
description.en: One of the Trotskyist organizations in China that merged to form the Communist League of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国的托洛茨基主义组织之一，参与合并组建了中国共产主义同盟。
description.en: One of the Trotskyist organizations in China that merged to form the Communist League of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国的托洛茨基主义组织之一，参与合并组建了中国共产主义同盟。
description.en: One of the Trotskyist organizations in China that merged to form the Communist League of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国的托洛茨基主义组织之一，参与合并组建了中国共产主义同盟。
description.en: One of the Trotskyist organizations in China that merged to form the Communist League of China.

description.zh-cn: 苏联马克思主义革命家，其建议促成了中国各托派组织的统一。
description.en: A Soviet Marxist revolutionary whose suggestions promoted the unification of Chinese Trotskyist organizations.

description.zh-cn: 由托洛茨基领导的共产国际内部派别，其建议促成了中国各托派组织的统一。
description.en: A faction within the Comintern led by Leon Trotsky, whose suggestions promoted the unification of Chinese Trotskyist organizations.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产主义同盟是从中国共产党分裂出来的组织。
description.en: The Communist League of China was a splinter organization from the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 由中国共产主义同盟多数派（彭述之派）于1948年改组而成。
description.en: Formed in 1948 from the reorganization of the majority faction (led by Peng Shuzhi) of the Communist League of China.

description.zh-cn: 由中国共产主义同盟少数派（王凡西、郑超麟派）于1949年改组而成。
description.en: Formed in 1949 from the reorganization of the minority faction (led by Wang Fanxi and Zheng Chaolin) of the Communist League of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产主义同盟总书记之一，后领导多数派改组为中国革命共产党。
description.en: One of the General Secretaries of the Communist League of China, who later led the majority faction to reorganize into the Chinese Revolutionary Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产主义同盟中央委员，后领导少数派改组为中国国际主义工人党。
description.en: A member of the Central Committee of the Communist League of China, who later led the minority faction to reorganize into the Internationalist Workers Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产主义同盟中央委员，后成为少数派（国际主义派）的领导人之一。
description.en: A member of the Central Committee of the Communist League of China, who later became one of the leaders of the minority faction (Internationalist Faction).

description.zh-cn: 无产者社成员，因未能当选中央执行委员而向淞沪警备司令部告发，导致多名托派成员被捕。
description.en: A member of the Proletarian Society who, after failing to be elected to the Central Executive Committee, reported to the Songhu Garrison Command, leading to the arrest of several Trotskyist members.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国时期的军事警察机构，曾负责逮捕和审判中国共产主义同盟成员。
description.en: A military police organization during the Republic of China era, responsible for arresting and trying members of the Communist League of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产主义同盟临时常委会秘书，被捕后招供，导致陈独秀等人被捕。
description.en: Secretary of the Provisional Standing Committee of the Communist League of China, who confessed after being arrested, leading to the arrest of Chen Duxiu and others.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国时期的司法机构，曾依据《危害民国紧急治罪法》判处陈独秀、彭述之等人徒刑。
description.en: A judicial body during the Republic of China era that sentenced Chen Duxiu, Peng Shuzhi, and others to prison according to the 'Emergency Law on Punishment of Crimes Endangering the Republic'.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国民政府时期的一部法律，被用于审判陈独秀等中国共产主义同盟成员。
description.en: A law from the Nationalist Government of the Republic of China period, used to try members of the Communist League of China such as Chen Duxiu.

description.zh-cn: 1936年发生的军事政变，其和平解决促成了抗日民族统一战线，并间接导致了包括陈独秀在内的政治犯获释。
description.en: A military coup in 1936 whose peaceful resolution led to the Second United Front against Japan and indirectly resulted in the release of political prisoners, including Chen Duxiu.

description.zh-cn: 托洛茨基派代表，1935年来到上海，在其主持的代表会议上，“中国共产党左派反对派”改名为“中国共产主义同盟”。
description.en: A representative of the Trotskyist faction who came to Shanghai in 1935. At a representative conference he presided over, the 'Chinese Communist Left Opposition' was renamed the 'Communist League of China'.

description.zh-cn: 在托洛茨基的建议下，中国的四个托派组织召开统一大会，成立了中国共产主义同盟（原名中国共产党左派反对派）。
description.en: At the suggestion of Leon Trotsky, four Trotskyist organizations in China held a unification conference and established the Communist League of China (originally named the Chinese Communist Left Opposition).

description.zh-cn: 在国际左翼反对派的建议下，中国的四个托派组织召开统一大会，成立了中国共产主义同盟（原名中国共产党左派反对派）。
description.en: At the suggestion of the International Left Opposition, four Trotskyist organizations in China held a unification conference and established the Communist League of China (originally named the Chinese Communist Left Opposition).

description.zh-cn: 无产者社是1931年5月合并成立中国共产主义同盟的四个托派组织之一。
description.en: The Proletarian Society was one of the four Trotskyist organizations that merged to form the Communist League of China in May 1931.

relationships.source: 中国布尔什维克列宁主义反对派

description.zh-cn: 中国布尔什维克列宁主义反对派是1931年5月合并成立中国共产主义同盟的四个托派组织之一。
description.en: The Chinese Bolshevik-Leninist Opposition was one of the four Trotskyist organizations that merged to form the Communist League of China in May 1931.

description.zh-cn: 十月社是1931年5月合并成立中国共产主义同盟的四个托派组织之一。
description.en: The October Society was one of the four Trotskyist organizations that merged to form the Communist League of China in May 1931.

description.zh-cn: 战斗社是1931年5月合并成立中国共产主义同盟的四个托派组织之一。
description.en: The Combat Society was one of the four Trotskyist organizations that merged to form the Communist League of China in May 1931.

description.zh-cn: 陈独秀是中国共产主义同盟的创始人，并被公推为首任书记。
description.en: Chen Duxiu was the founder of the Communist League of China and was elected as its first secretary.

description.zh-cn: 彭述之曾担任中国共产主义同盟的总书记。
description.en: Peng Shuzhi served as the General Secretary of the Communist League of China.

description.zh-cn: 马玉夫因未当选中央执行委员，向淞沪警备司令部告密，导致中国共产主义同盟刚选出的中央委员会9名执委中的5名被捕，对组织造成了严重破坏。
description.en: After failing to be elected to the Central Executive Committee, Ma Yufu informed the Songhu Garrison Command, leading to the arrest of 5 of the 9 newly elected executive committee members of the Communist League of China, causing severe damage to the organization.

description.zh-cn: 谢德盘在1932年10月被捕后招供，提供了陈独秀的住址，直接导致了陈独秀的被捕。
description.en: After being arrested in October 1932, Xie Depan confessed and provided Chen Duxiu's address, which directly led to Chen's arrest.

description.zh-cn: 1933年4月26日，江苏省高等法院依据《危害民国紧急治罪法》判处陈独秀有期徒刑，后经上诉改判为8年。陈独秀直到1937年8月23日才获释。
description.en: On April 26, 1933, the Jiangsu High Court sentenced Chen Duxiu to prison based on the 'Emergency Law on Punishment of Crimes Endangering the Republic'. The sentence was later reduced to 8 years on appeal. Chen was not released until August 23, 1937.

description.zh-cn: 1933年4月26日，江苏省高等法院依据《危害民国紧急治罪法》判处彭述之有期徒刑，后经上诉改判为8年。彭述之直到1937年8月23日才获释。
description.en: On April 26, 1933, the Jiangsu High Court sentenced Peng Shuzhi to prison based on the 'Emergency Law on Punishment of Crimes Endangering the Republic'. The sentence was later reduced to 8 years on appeal. Peng was not released until August 23, 1937.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争爆发后，根据“西安事变”中应允的“释放全部政治犯”的协议，陈独秀于1937年8月23日获释出狱。
description.en: After the outbreak of the Second Sino-Japanese War, Chen Duxiu was released from prison on August 23, 1937, in accordance with the agreement made during the 'Xi'an Incident' to 'release all political prisoners'.

description.zh-cn: 1935年，托洛茨基派代表格拉斯来到上海，在其主持下召开代表会议，将“中国共产党左派反对派”改名为“中国共产主义同盟”。
description.en: In 1935, Trotskyist representative 'Glass' came to Shanghai and presided over a conference that renamed the 'Chinese Communist Left Opposition' to the 'Communist League of China'.

description.zh-cn: 1948年9月，彭述之领导中国共产主义同盟的多数派，将其改组为中国革命共产党，并担任书记。
description.en: In September 1948, Peng Shuzhi led the majority faction of the Communist League of China to reorganize it into the Chinese Revolutionary Communist Party, and he served as its secretary.

description.zh-cn: 1949年4月，中国共产主义同盟少数派改组为中国国际主义工人党，并选举王凡西为书记。
description.en: In April 1949, the minority faction of the Communist League of China reorganized into the Internationalist Workers Party of China and elected Wang Fanxi as its secretary.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产主义同盟多数派改组为中国革命共产党，标志着原统一组织的解体。
description.en: The reorganization of the majority faction of the Communist League of China into the Chinese Revolutionary Communist Party marked the dissolution of the original unified organization.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产主义同盟少数派改组为中国国际主义工人党，标志着原统一组织的解体。
description.en: The reorganization of the minority faction of the Communist League of China into the Internationalist Workers Party of China marked the dissolution of the original unified organization.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产主义同盟由从中国共产党分裂出的托洛茨基主义者组成，其成立深受早期中共党内路线斗争的影响。
description.en: The Communist League of China was formed by Trotskyists who had split from the Communist Party of China, and its establishment was deeply influenced by the early inner-party line struggles of the CPC.
